description: dark triangular-shaped rock in ocean--forming a dark diamond shape with rock and its reflection in water; high horizon line; bright sunlight on water to right of rock
inscription: Signature, Title, Date, Edition and Stamp
markings: see Signed; LRC of mount, in pencil: [6/25]

title: Northern California Coast, Pacific Ocean
